    • toModifyCustomer

      public void toModifyCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Button function that redirects the user to the 'modifyCustomer' page. Will populate the modifyCustomer page with the data for the selectedCustomer, or if one isn't currently selected it will generate an error alert.

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Button function that deletes the selectedCustomer after confirming the selection with a confirmation alert. Generates an error alert if no customer is currently selected.

    • searchCustomers

      public void searchCustomers(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Populates the customers tableView with all customers related to the currently logged in user that match the search criteria. When the user selects the search button, the program parses through the database and returns all customers that match the search criteria. Customers in the database must match by customerID, name, address, or phone, as indicated by the prompt text in the search bar.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • toReports

      public void toReports(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Button function that redirects the user back to the 'reports' page.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toAppointments

      public void toAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Button function that redirects the user back to the 'appointments' page.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • closeApplication

      public void closeApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
